meanings.definition: An uncontrollable craving for alcoholic drinks.
meanings.sent1: Her dipsomanias led her to drink excessively every night.
meanings.sent2: His dipsomanias caused him to struggle with alcohol addiction.
meanings.sent3: The dipsomanias of the party guests made the bartender work overtime.
meanings.sent4: The dipsomanias of the city seemed to never fade, like an unquenchable thirst.
meanings.sent5: The dipsomanias of the character in the story were portrayed with great intensity.
